translations: 阴谋者；同谋者（conspirator 的复数）

sentences.sentence: The faces of the two conspirators gave the game away!
sentences.translation: 两个同谋者的表情露出了马脚。

sentences.sentence: The head of the navy heaped scorn on both the methods and motives of the conspirators.
sentences.translation: 这位海军首领对密谋分子的做法和动机都给予了极大的蔑视。

sentences.sentence: Julius Caesar was murdered by a group of conspirators famously headed by Marcus Junius Brutus.
sentences.translation: 尤利乌斯·凯撒被以人所共知的马库斯·朱尼厄斯·布鲁特斯为首脑的一伙谋反者谋杀了。
